nodes.text: A battle took place during the first year of the Clone Wars on the planet Korriban. Jedi Master Eeth Koth led a detachment of clone troopers to defend the besieged people of Korriban, but his troops suffered numerous casualties against their enemy. His fellow Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi had a brief vision of the battle while on a mission to the planet Zigoola.
The battle was briefly mentioned in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a 2008 novel written by Karen Miller.
